title: Variables & Input/Output
concept: This level teaches how to declare variables in C, take input using scanf(), and format output using printf(). You will practice integers, floats and characters. Focus on correct format specifiers: %d for int, %f for float, %c for char. Do not add extra text beyond what is required.

challenges.title: Square the Number
challenges.description: Read an integer and print its square.

challenges.title: Add and Print
challenges.description: Read two integers and print their sum.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers separated by a space.

challenges.title: Multiply and Display
challenges.description: Read two integers and print their product.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers separated by a space.

challenges.title: Average of Two
challenges.description: Read two floating-point numbers and print their average.
challenges.inputDescription: Two floats separated by a space.

challenges.title: Area of Rectangle
challenges.description: Given length and breadth, print the area.

challenges.title: Swap Numbers (No Temp)
challenges.description: Read two integers and swap them without using a third variable. Print them after swapping separated by a space.

challenges.title: Meters to Centimeters

challenges.title: Minutes to Hours
challenges.description: Convert minutes to hours (float output allowed).
